basic_info.description: I am Keshava Pranath. I am  an AI Engineer and Ex-Full stack developer skilled in Python, JavaScript, Databases and Web-development. I am enthusiastic about delivering feasible and innovative solution and tackle the challenges.

projects.title: Real-Time Object Detection
projects.description: Real-Time Object detection and Tracking for vehicles on the videos using Computer Vision and Deep Learning. A YOLOv8 model used to detect objects in the frame and DeepSort model used to track the detected object. Both models fine-tuned to detect and track multiple objects in the frame. NVIDIA TensorRT used to optimise the performance for higher frame-rates and perform better with different occulation and varying light conditions.

projects.title: Photography
projects.description: Personal project for study subject. I was responsible for testing photography application that optimizes images with popular algorithms used by graphic editors like Pixlr or Adobe Photoshop. I've earned A grade :)

projects.title: 3D Object Viewer
projects.description: One of the first apps I was working on my internship. I had to develop front-end implementation for app that shows 3D models of known buildings. This was also my first project in Angular framework. I've learned a lot!
